#summary Reading directions to learn OntoUML and start modeling

= OntoUML Study Guide =

==Introductory Readings==

To learn about some fundamental concepts related to the "Ontology World" e about ontology-driven conceptual modeling, we suggest the papers below: 

  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/FAIA.pdf On Ontology, ontologies, Conceptualizations, Modeling Languages, and (Meta) Models]
  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/BalticDB&IS.pdf The Role of Foundational Ontologies for Conceptual Modeling and Domain Ontology Representation 
  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/EMMSAD@CAISE09.pdf On the importance of Truly Ontological Distinctions for Ontology Representation Languages: An Industrial Case Study in the Domain of Oil and Gas 
  * [http://www.researchgate.net/publication/220259945_Do_Ontological_Deficiencies_in_Modeling_Grammars_Matter Do Ontological Deficiencies in Modeling Grammars Matter?]

==General Readings==

For a complete description of UFO-A and OntoUML, read the "OntoUML Bible":<br>

  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/OFSCM.pdf Ontological Foundations for Structural Conceptual Models]<br>

For a "softer" introduction, we recommend the theoretical background chapters of a the thesis:<br>
  * [https://www.researchgate.net/publication/268220197_Ontology_Validation_for_Managers Ontology Validation for Managers]<br>
  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~rguizzardi/OEO/dissertacao-Veruska.pdf Estudo de Alternativas de Mapeamento de Ontologias da Linguagem OntoUML para OWL: Abordagens para representação de Informação Temporal -- in Portuguese]<br>
  * [https://rcarraretto.googlecode.com/files/Carraretto2012MSc.pdf Separating Ontological and Informational Concerns: A Model-driven Approach for Conceptual Modeling] <br>

==Specific Readings==
The following readings are separated by topic of interest.

====General Foundations:====

  * [http://doc.utwente.nl/49866/1/WPI.pdf A Formal Theory of Conceptual Modeling Universals]

====Roles, Relators and Qua Individuals:====

  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/quaEntities.pdf Agent Roles, Qua Individuals and The Counting Problem]
  * [http://www.irit.fr/publis/LILAC/MGVBF-rolesAAAI05.pdf Relational Roles and Qua-individuals]

====Part-Whole Relations:====
  * *Functional Parthood:* [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/CAISE2009CR.pdf The Problem of Transitivity of Part-Whole Relations in Conceptual Modeling Revisited]
  * *Collectives:* [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/CAISE2011-CR.pdf Ontological Foundations for Conceptual Part-Whole Relations: The Case of Collectives and their Parts]
  * *Quantities:* [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/FOIS2010.pdf On the Representation of Quantities and their Parts in Conceptual Modeling]
  * *De Re / De Dicto:* [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/CAISE-CR-2007.pdf Modal Aspects of Object Types and Part-Whole Relations and the de re/de dicto Distinction]

====Qualities:====
  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/PID2733627.pdf An Ontological Foundation for Conceptual Modeling Datatypes based on Semantic Reference Spaces]

====Events*:====
  * [http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/Towards%20Ontological%20Foundations%20for%20the%20Conceptual%20modeling%20of%20events.pdf Towards Ontological Foundations for the Conceptual Modeling of Events]
